Cheap VPS Servers in Dallas, Texas from FullVPSServer with Unlimited Bandwidth!

cheap vps, dallas, full vps server, fullvpsserver, texas September 30, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

We saw FullVPSServer most recently back on November 22, 2020.  They’ve returned with some cheap VPS (KVM) offers in Dallas, Texas:

  • Get a 1GB VPS for $7/month, or $70/year (which works out to $5.83/month)
  • 2GB and 4GB VMs are available as well
  • All systems include unlimited transfer on a 100Mbps port

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in Mexico. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Paypal, Bitcoin, and Ethereum.

Here’s a little about FullVPSServer in their own words:

“Full VPS Server SSD VPS Servers are powered by the latest Intel Hardware including extremely fast SSD Raid protected storage. Each SSD VPS includes our advanced features, DDOS protection, 100Mb network and 24/7 Support.

FullVPSServer was founded in 2016 with the core concept of providing a optimal services for our clients, our leading team of specialist with virtualizacion with more 15 years experience know the best use for the vps services, also FullVPSServer keep costs low and quality high by providing our own in-house maintenance and total privacity in your information. free setup and High bandwidth for all of our service packages. Our data center locations are also strategically located to provide optimal speed and quality for each region we service.”

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with FullVPSServer.
